intro: Psychotria stictophylla, commonly known as the red psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, where it typically grows in moist, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its dark green, elliptical leaves and small, clustered white flowers. Its fruit is a capsule that contains numerous tiny seeds. Psychotria stictophylla is often found in rainforests and is adapted to thrive in high humidity and partial sunlight.
